It's 2021, why haven't you still played this? There isn't much to say about this game except for WOW. If you haven't already, buy the portal bundle and play both of the games because portal / portal 2 are both classical masterpieces.

Wow, what a game Portal 2 is! The first Portal was already excellent, albeit a little short, but Portal 2 simply takes everything great from Portal 1, improves it and adds even more variety. The story is very engaging and the new characters that are introduced in the story fit in perfectly.

The game is a 3d puzzle platformer (that part is also excellent) but I would argue that it is not the main selling point here. For me personally, the story and voice acting is where Portal 2 really shines. So much passion and excellent humor make the story very immersive and the gameplay breathtaking right until the very end.

It is hard to think of a better sequel to an already great game. There is really nothing to fault here. You just want even more, although the game is quite a lot longer than Portal 1, plus it has Co-op levels after the main campaign.

If there ever has been a game to recommend, it is Portal 2. Arguably, one of the best if not THE BEST game ever made! And that is coming from someone who is not generally a fan of 3d platformer games.
Legit the best game of all time
